speaker: agent
text: If you have a new order for glass in your home or business, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: If you have a new order for glass in your vehicle, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: If you are making a payment, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: If you have a scheduling question or for anything else pertaining to an existing order, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: customer
text: Or if you would like to leave a message.

speaker: agent
text: Thank you for calling all other callers.

speaker: agent
text: Please hold for the next available [OCCUPATION] glass.

speaker: agent
text: Ok, I've got two windows that have have lost their seale in my house.

speaker: agent
text: If you would like I can get a ticket started for you so we can get a [OCCUPATION] out there and get some measurements.

speaker: agent
text: Do you give estimates over the phone or do they have to come here get measure to get the estimate?

speaker: customer
text: We can do measurements over the phone but usually prefer there is no cost for you to have us come out there and give you those quotes.

speaker: agent
text: That way we can also see exactly what we're looking at as well when it comes to the frame or anything else involved with the glass.

speaker: agent
text: I'd like to make an appointment then, please.

speaker: agent
text: What's a good phone number for you and how do I spell your first and last name?

speaker: customer
text: All right, get this set up for that quote.

speaker: agent
text: And what is a good address for you, [PERSON_NAME]?

speaker: agent
text: And you said it was two windows, correct?

speaker: customer
text: I've got another problem, but I don't think.

speaker: agent
text: I don't know how if you can fix it or not.

speaker: customer
text: But my window, I've had some settling on my house and so the windows are just kind of enough out of TLT that they are real hard to open and close.

speaker: agent
text: So I don't know that there's anything you guys can do other than just replace the whole window or I'm not even sure what would be involved in that.

speaker: customer
text: In most cases when the seal fails we have to replace it with a new unit is because once the seal has failed that the unit is compromised and they're manufactured that way.

speaker: agent
text: We manufacture our own units here in [LOCATION] [LOCATION] so we can do those replacements.

speaker: agent
text: And let me pull up the schedule to see when I got some availability to have a [OCCUPATION] come out and get some measurementsk.

speaker: customer
text: It looks like I've got some availability tomorrow, if that's all right with you.

speaker: customer
text: Could it be on the morning side?

speaker: customer
text: I can have the same appointment.

speaker: agent
text: That way we have enough time.

speaker: agent
text: Make sure you make it to your appointment on time.

speaker: agent
text: So they'll call me and let me know when they're coming?

speaker: agent
text: What we'll be doing is reaching out to you this evening to confirm that appointment and give you a rough time that's meant to expect the [OCCUPATION].

speaker: agent
text: And then he'll be giving you a call tomorrow before heading at your direction and let you know he's on the way.

speaker: agent
text: I may not be available by phone this this afternoon and this evening, so you can just leave a message.
